title: Understanding the Type of Analysis
text: Consider the purpose of the sensor. Is it meant to measure, identify, or develop a new understanding of carbon monoxide detection?

title: Different Types of Analysis
text: In analytical chemistry, analysis can be qualitative, quantitative, characterization, or fundamental. Which category does developing a sensor fall into?

title: Defining Fundamental Analysis
text: Fundamental analysis often involves developing new methods or technologies. Does this align with the development of a new sensor?
